attributes.action: Reduce all levels of stamp duty on house purchases.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The value of your home has increased disproportionately compared to your income. In addition, the level of stamp duty has remained unchanged. This needs to be addressed urgently to reduce the financial burden on those purchasing their home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
